text: Had a pleasant experience throughout, Geraldine the receptionist/nurse welcomed us kindly and we settled our registration quite quickly. There was only 1 patient before us and we waited about 45mins or so to enter. Dr. Tan was very gentle and addressed all our concerns well - overall he was also very patient and listened to us too. He offered alternatives and provided good advice.

Had a very good pregnancy journey experience with Dr Tan which provided professional advise and provided us assurance to our concerns that we have during the journey. Clinic staff are also very nice and friendly that will always welcome us to the clinic with a great smile which makes our visits very pleasant! Thank you once again for taking such great care of us for the last few months and also having such a smooth delivery of our baby!

I truly cannot express enough gratitude to Dr. Tan Lick's team, Grace, and Geraldine. They are truly a specialized team. Excellent care, attentive to detail, and addressing every necessary aspect.

My baby was born in great health, with a healthy weight. From start to finish, I felt well cared for and supported. I am generally a very nervous person, but I felt such warmth and reassurance from everyone.

Thank you so much!! ‚ù£Ô∏è We will definitely see you again next time!

Had a wonderful pregnancy journey accompany my wife from all her scans to deliver. Friendly doctor and staffs we encounter here, doctor gives clear explanation for treatments and procedures, before we make any decisions. Will gladly recommend others to have their pregnancy journey with Dr Tan and the team.

Their service is top-notch and I was well taken cared of.
Grace was really approachable and easy to deal with.
Thank you Dr. Tan and his entire team for such a good service! I highly recommend Thomson Clinic! üôÇ
